name: Kill zombie you.
description: Kill your zombified character with another character.

name: Carry 50 pairs of socks at once.
Wear a piece of military clothing.
Eat an entire bacon stir fry.
Consume 5 different types of alcoholic beverages.
Cultivate a garden with at least 3 different crops.
Cook a meal that has 5 different fresh ingredients.
Amass a collection of 50 unique items in one container.
Find a car with the key inside.
Kill a zombie with a blade stuck in them.
description:
Long Bladed: Katana, Machete
Short Bladed: Knife Butter, Knife Butter, Fork, Gardening Fork, Hand Scythe, Hunting Knife, Ice Pick, Kitchen Knife, Letter Opener, Cleaver, Scalpel, Scissors, Screwdriver, Broken Bottle, Spoon, Stake, Stone Knife

name: Sleep in a bed with HottieZ and tissues in the bedside table.
Trap three types of animals in traps.
description: Different types, using any means necessary (snares or cage traps)

name: Never use an axe.
description: Hand, wood, stone or two-handed. Pickaxe is ok.

name: Never craft or repair a weapon.
Never cook any meals.
description: Meals you find cooked are okay.

name: Never use beds to sleep or pass the night.
Never rip any clothing items or fabric.
Deconstruct all of the furniture in a house.
description: Free-standing house only. This includes all furniture: beds, dining, shelves but nothing in the kitchen.

name: Become soaking wet.
description: Literally. The moodle called 'Soaking'. 70% total body wetness.
